bibl.title: Family Affairs: Guild Regulations and Family Relationships in Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: Families and guild membership in Roman Egypt. - Guild charters, families, and trust. - Crimes and misdemeanors. - Beyond the banquet: apprenticeship. - Conclusions.
bibl.seg: VENTICINQUE Philip F., Family Affairs: Guild Regulations and Family Relationships in Roman Egypt.
Families and guild membership in Roman Egypt. - Guild charters, families, and trust. - Crimes and misdemeanors. - Beyond the banquet: apprenticeship. - Conclusions.
